concept.title: 552.238-77 Submission and Distribution of Authorized Federal Supply Schedule (FSS) Price Lists.

conbody.p: As prescribed in 538.273(d)(1), insert the following clause:
Submission and Distribution of Authorized Federal Supply Schedule (FSS) Price Lists (MAR 2020)

li.p: (a)The Contractor shall submit its Authorized Federal Supply Schedule Price List on a common-use electronic medium as prescribed by GSA. Some structured data entry in a prescribed format may be required.
(b)Eligible ordering activities will utilize GSA’s online shopping and ordering system to review a Contractors’ price lists.
